1.「究極の一皿を 作ること……| それは もはや 目標などではなく| 心の底から求: To create the ultimate dish... It's no longer|a goal, but something instinctive, something|that you want from the bottom of your heart.

15.この姿になると お菓子作りに目覚め|ぺったんぺったん生地を こねるべく|各地の:
When I look like this, I wake up and start|making sweets, and I go to every place in|front of the chopping board to knead the|
|dough...

16.この姿になると 野外で|究極のカレーを食べるべく|各所の野営地を 回るらしい。: When I look like this, I go around to|different campsites to eat the ultimate curry|in the open air...

17.この姿になると 道路のわきで|身体を クネクネさせながら|ヒッチハイクせずには: When I look like this, I can't help but|hitchhike along the side of the road, my body|twisting and turning...

18.この姿になると 各地にいる|ご老人と のんびり|語りあいたく なるらしい。: When I look like this, I just want to relax|and talk with old people from all over...

19.この姿になると 考古学に目覚め|古い歴史を持つ遺跡に|行きたくて たまらなくなる: When I look like this, I can't wait to get|into archeology and visit old historical|sites...

21.この姿になると お姫様気質となり|安心安全な 場所から 優雅に|海を見つめてみた:
When I look like this, I feel like a|princess, and I want to stare at the ocean|from the safety and security of my own|
|home...

23.この姿になると パカラパカラと前進し|ゾンビ系の魔物に 正々堂々と|一騎打ちを: In this form, I'm tempted to go pakalapakala|and challenge the zombie demons to a fair|fight...

26.いい感じのまな板は レンダーシアにある。|そんなウワサを どこからか聞きつけ|し:
I've been looking for a good cutting board...|I've heard rumors of such a thing from|somewhere, and I've been searching for|
|something that fits...

28.究極のカレーには レンダーシードを|隠し味に使うとよいとの ウワサを信じ|レンダ: Believing in the rumor that renderseed is the|best secret ingredient for the ultimate|curry, I went to the renderseed...

30.ヒッチハイクは 日中にやるものだという|信条からか だいたい 日が出ている時間帯: Because of my belief that hitchhiking is|supposed to be done during the day, I usually|show up in Lendershya when the sun is up...

32.一脈 通じるものがあるのか もっぱら|勇気の民のおじいちゃん のもとにばかり|通: I'm not sure if there's a connection, but|I've been going to Grandpa Courage's for|years...

34.古い遺跡を求め 行きついた先は|中央の 大きな大陸。|そこで歴史ロマンを 肌で感: I'm looking for old ruins, and I end up in|the middle of a large... I'm experiencing the|romance of history firsthand...

36.レンダーシアの海岸地帯で|何を思って 海を見つめ続けるのか|それは彼女にしか わ: Only she knows what she's thinking as she|stares out at the sea on the shores of|Rendasia...

38.レンダーシアには ゾンビ系の強者たちが|集まるという 情報をもとに 各所を|愛馬:
I've been running around Lenderia with my|horse, Bomber, based on a report that it's|home to some of the most powerful zombies in|
|the world.

40.いい感じに 雨のような水しぶきを|求めた結果 たどり着いたのは|レンダーシアの: In search of a nice, rainy splash, we ended|up in a remote part of Lendasia...

41.「自分の やっていることこそが| 真の モグラたたきなんだぞ！ っていう| ゆる:
What you're doing is the true whack-a-mole!|You have to beat around the bush with an|unshakable conviction that what you're doing|
|is the true whack-a-mole!

42.「今のところ いちばん しっくりくる のは| パンがおいしい 村の家にある| ま: So far, the one that fits best is the|chopping board in the village house where the|bread is good...

43.「ワルドの香辛料に リャナのスープ| ローヌの米俵……と思ったら| なんだよ た: Spices from Waldo, soup from Lyanna, rice|bales from the Rhone... I thought, "What the|hell, it's just a bunch of hay!

44.「日光が 目にしみるから| サングラスは はずせないのさ。| ワイルドに のるぜ: I can't take off my sunglasses because the|sun stings my eyes. I'm gonna ride wild!

46.「落ち着ける場所で のんびりと| 熱いお茶を 飲みながらの語らいは| えもいわれ: There's something indescribably special about|sitting in a comfortable place, sipping hot|tea and talking...

48.「街道の遺跡に 海岸の遺跡| 文明の異なる ふたつのピラミッド。| われの 歴史: The remains of a road, the remains of a|beach, two different civilizations... My|historical curiosity is...

50.「ああ いとしの おさかなさん。| どうして あなたは そんなにおいしそうなの？: Oh, my dearest baby... Why do you look so|delicious? Please put it in my bag...

52.「ハイヨ～ ボンバ～| 目指すは内海の 中央にある島！| 大丈夫！ お前なら海で: We're going to an island in the middle of the|inland sea! Don't worry! You can make it|across the sea!

54.「あめ あめ ふれ ふれ みなさんが～♪| みつけてくれて うれしいな～| かん: Rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain| I'm so glad you found me| ♪ The warmth of a car's heart ♪

80.「いつか スイの塔をピカピカに| おそうじする夢がありまして そのための| チカ: I have a dream to clean up Sui's tower one|day, and I'm training myself to do it.

103.「あわよくば セクシーショットを……などとは| みじんも思わず。ただ純粋に 美容: I was hoping for a sexy shot. I'm not here to|take sexy shots. I just wanted to take|pictures of the hair stylists at their best.

116.この姿になると 各領界にある|ほこらの ひんやりした場所に|こもりたくなるらしい: When I look like this, I feel like hiding in|one of those cool caves in each realm...

117.この姿になると ご飯に合いそうな|おかずを 探すべく|各領界の酒場に 出没するら: In this form, he frequents the taverns of|each realm in search of side dishes that go|well with rice...

118.この姿になると それなりに安全な場所で|人の形をしたものに 数学の個人授業を|受: In this form, I'm on a mission to get a|private math lesson from a disembodied being|in a reasonably safe place...

120.この姿になると 肉をおいしく|調理できる場所を 求めて|各地の気に入った場所を: In this form, they go around to their|favorite places to find the best places to|cook meat...

124.この姿になると 火の勢いが|強くなりそうな場所に|行きたくなるらしい。: When I look like this, I want to go somewhere|where the fire will be strong...

125.この姿になると 自身をキンキンに|冷やせそうな 水場を求めて|あちこちを さまよ: In this form, they wander from place to place|in search of water where they can cool|themselves down...

126.この姿になると サーカスの興行で|各領界の 過酷な場所を目指し そこの魔物たちに: In this form, I'm a circus performer who|travels to the harshest parts of the realm to|show off my tricks to the demons there.

127.冷たいクリームで できているため|暑さが苦手で 炎の領界にだけは|絶対に 行きた: Because it's made of cold cream, it doesn't|like the heat, and it never wants to go to|the Fiery Realm...

128.水につかると フニャフニャになりそうなので|水の領界にだけは 行かないでおこうと: I've made up my mind not to go into the|watery realm because I'm afraid I'll get all|squishy if I do...

129.燃えて 灰になってしまいそうなので|炎の領界には 近づかないようにしようと|計算: I'm moving, calculating to stay out of the|flames' domain, because I'm afraid I'll burn|to ashes...

131.調理方法は 特殊な花の香りを つけてから|高く寒い場所で カチコチに冷やし|高温:
The way it's cooked is by applying a special|floral scent, then cooling it down to a crawl|in a high, cold place and roasting it over a|
|hot flame.

133.見る場所すべて 稲作には適さない土地で|もういっそ 眼前に見えている でかい塔の:
All the places I see are unsuitable for rice|cultivation, and I'm thinking of growing|greenhouses in the big tower I see in front|
|of me...

134.結局のところ そんな条件を満たすのは|炎の領界ぐらい だったらしく|他の領界では: After all, it seems that the only realm that|met those requirements was the Fiery Realm,|and you won't find it in any other realm...

147.そもそも まともな水場なんて|氷の領界と 水の領界ぐらいにしか無く|他の領界では: To begin with, there are only decent watering|holes in the Ice Realm and Water Realm, and|you won't find any in the other realms...

149.陰気な場所を好み とても丈夫な骨ゆえに|炎熱などの環境変化にも 余裕で耐えられる:
He likes gloomy places, and his strong bones|allow him to endure heat and other|environmental changes, but he's not good in|
|sacred, light-filled places.

153.「氷の領界のほこらにある 氷柱は| とても冷たくて いちばん居心地がいいね！|:
The icicles in the hollows of the Ice Realm|are so cold, they're the most comfortable|place to be! It's just... The hollow in the|
|Storm Realm is...

156.「カーラモーラ村の酒場には おかずがない。| みんなが飲んでいる あのお酒は き: At the tavern in the village of Kara-Mora,|there are side dishes... That drink they're|drinking must be made from rice... Isn't it?

157.この姿になると お風呂が大好きになり|お風呂を求めて 五大陸の町のどこかに|ぬる: In this form, he loves baths, and lurks|somewhere in the cities of the five|continents in search of them...

159.この姿になると 丸いこうらのように|性格も丸くなり のんびりと|おだやかな 気持: In this form, like a round cone, their|personality becomes round, and they become|relaxed and calm...

161.この姿になると 料理がしたくて|たまらなくなってしまい 思わず 五大陸の|お城の: When I look like this, I can't wait to cook,|and I can't help but feel like I'm in the|kitchen of a castle on five continents...

163.この姿になると 美しい被写体を|探さずには いられなくなり 被写体を求めて|旅す: When you look like this, you can't help but|look for beautiful subjects, and in my quest|to find them, I ended up at a camp...

165.この姿になると 無性に色々なモノを|たたきたくなってしまうそうだが|たたかれても: I've heard that when you look like this, you|feel the urge to hit things, but it doesn't|hurt that much...

167.この姿になると 周囲を|おそうじして ピカピカにしようという|使命感が 芽生える: When I look like this, I feel a sense of|mission to clean up my surroundings and make|them shine...

169.「キミは なかなか賢そうな顔立ちをしているね。| では 女神像くん よく聞きたま: You have a very wise face. Now, Goddess,|listen to me... How do we find the volume of|this church?

171.「この肉の調理で 一番きついのは| 間違いなく 影の谷で 花が咲くのを| ひたす: The hardest part about cooking this meat is|definitely waiting patiently for it to bloom|in the valley of the shadow.

172.この姿になると 心にも身体にも|チカラがみなぎり 無性に|すもうを とりたくなる: When I look like this, my mind and body are|filled with energy, and I can't help but want|to play sumo...

174.「毒の大地に 全部海水 荒れた嵐の大地と| いくらなんでも これはちょっと厳しい: A poisoned land, all seawater, a stormy|land... it's all a bit much... Well, then,|what if we go inside that tower?

176.この姿になると キレイな水が無いと|生きられなくなるため キレイな水を求めて|各: In this form, they need clean water to|survive, so they fly from place to place in|search of clean water...

177.「ここから見える 竜のシルエットは| 今にも 動きはじめそうで| 心が 燃え上が: The silhouette of the dragon seen from here|looks like it's about to start moving, and|it's a wind that makes my heart burn.

178.素敵な お風呂があるのは|きっと大きな国に 違いない。|そんな思いで お風呂を探: There must be a big country with nice|baths... That's why I keep looking for a|bath...

180.三度の食事より こうら干しが 好きなため|自然と 太陽の出ている時間帯に|姿を見: They like to dry their eggs rather than eat|three meals a day, so they naturally show up|when the sun is out...

182.作る料理のウデ前は 各国の料理長も|認めるほどで 作る速度も通常の９倍にのぼり|:
He's so good at what he does that chefs from|all over the world agree that he cooks nine|times faster than normal, and when he shows|
|up, he cooks a lot faster.

183.たどり着いたキャンプ地では 見習い美容師たちの|美しさに心をうばわれ 彼女たちを: When I arrived at the camp, I was so taken by|the beauty of the apprentice hairdressers|that I vowed to make them my subjects.

184.モグラの宿命的に 日光が目にしみるので|もっぱら 夜から朝にかけて|活動するよう: As is the fate of all moles, sunlight stings|their eyes, so they try to be active mostly|at night and in the morning...

185.おそうじは 明るいうちからを信条に|できるかぎり朝から おそうじ開始するよう|心: I try to start cleaning as early as possible|in the morning, but sometimes I oversleep...

186.「ツボから流れ出る 心地よい水が| ワシのからだを キンキンに冷やしてくれる。|: The soothing water flowing from the urn is|chilling me to the bone... Aaahhhh... a nice|river...

188.「ここは 清廉な空気と聖なる光にあふれている。| お客は……モコフル達か。| 気: This place is filled with clean air and holy|light... The guests... Mokov... If I'm not|careful, I'll be purified...

189.五大陸の各地にいる ライバルたちと|日夜 一緒にケイコしたり おいしい ご飯を|:
I've been working with rivals from all over|the five continents, day and night, caving|together, eating delicious meals, and getting|
|to know each other.

190.「キレイナ水場ヲ求メテ イロイロ回ルウチ| ウェナ諸島ニ 行キツイタノダ。| ナ:
I've been looking for a nice watering hole,|and the more I look around, the more I think|I'm going to the Wena Islands. I've always|
|loved beautiful places!

191.夜行性で キレイな水であれば 塩からい水でも|イケるクチ。望みの水場を見つけると:
They're nocturnal, and as long as the water|is clean, even salty water will do. When they|find the water they want, their bodies start|
|to glow.

193.「まだまだ ライバルたちには| 全然かなわないけれど いつかは勝てるように| い: I'm still no match for my rivals, but I'm|going to try my hardest to win one day!

194.「前略 メギストリスの都では どこを探しても| お風呂が見つからず 悲しみにうち:
In the city of Megistris, no matter where I|looked, I couldn't find a bath, so I stared|at the moat in a daze, shaking with grief...|
|The grass

195.「この姿になると 自分が 恐竜なのか| ムシなのか アイデンティティに悩むのです: When I look like this, I wonder if I'm a|dinosaur or an insect, and I struggle with my|identity, but when I think about it, I'm a...
